en.ms: There is but one God. By the True Guru's grace, He is attained.

en.ms: Contemplating God's Name, flower thou, O my brother.
en.ssk: Meditate on the Lord's Name, and blossom forth in green abundance.

en.bdb: By your high destiny, you have been blessed with this wondrous spring of the soul.
en.ms: In accordance with the writ of destiny, thou are blessed with this beauteous season.
en.ssk: By your high destiny, you have been blessed with this wondrous spring of the soul.

en.ms: Obtaining the ambrosial fruit of the Name the woods, grass and the three worlds have bloomed.
en.ssk: See all the three worlds in bloom, and obtain the Fruit of Ambrosial Nectar.

es.sn: Voltea alrededor y ve los tres mundos en flor y la vegetación toda dando sus frutos de Néctar,

verse.unicode: ਮਿਲਿ ਸਾਧੂ ਸੁਖੁ ਊਪਜੈ ਲਥੀ ਸਭ ਛਾਈ ॥

en.bdb: Meeting with the Holy Saints, peace wells up, and all sins are erased.
en.ms: Meeting with the saints bliss wells up and all the darkness of sins is dispelled.
en.ssk: Meeting with the Holy Saints, peace wells up, and all sins are erased.

es.sn: sí, encontrando al Santo, eres bendecido con Éxtasis y liberado de la consecuencia de tus acciones.

verse.gurmukhi: nwnku ismrY eyku nwmu iPir bhuiV n DweI ]1]
verse.unicode: ਨਾਨਕੁ ਸਿਮਰੈ ਏਕੁ ਨਾਮੁ ਫਿਰਿ ਬਹੁੜਿ ਨ ਧਾਈ ॥੧॥

en.bdb: O Nanak, remember in meditation the One Name, and you shall never again be consigned to the womb of reincarnation.. ||1||
en.ms: Nanak utters but the One Lord's Name, and he shall wander not in existences again.
en.ssk: O Nanak, remember in meditation the One Name, and you shall never again be consigned to the womb of reincarnation.. ||1||

ss.gurmukhi: nwnk (BI) pRBU dw hI nwm ismrdw hY (qy jo mnu`K ismrdw hY aus ƒ) muV muV jnm mrn dy gyV ivc Btkxw nhIN pYNdw [1[

es.sn: Nanak medita sólo en el Nombre de Dios, él no será puesto otra vez en ningún otro vientre. (1)

en.bdb: The five powerful desires are bound down, when you lean on the True Lord.
en.ms: Obtaining the support of the True Name, I have chained the five very powerful demons.
en.ssk: The five powerful desires are bound down, when you lean on the True Lord.

en.bdb: All creatures belong to God, our Lord and Master. Who can place a value on Him?
en.ms: Men and all other beings belong to the Lord. Who can appraise their worth?
en.ssk: All creatures belong to God, our Lord and Master. Who can place a value on Him?

es.sn: Todas las criaturas pertenecen a Dios, ¿quién podría Evaluarlo?

en.bdb: Those who meditate, listen and chant, those devotees are blessed and beautified.
en.ms: Beauteous are the saints, who ever utter, contemplate and hear the Lord's Name.
en.ssk: Those who meditate, listen and chant, those devotees are blessed and beautified.

es.sn: Los que recitan, escuchan y meditan en Dios, oh benditos, benditos son esos Devotos.

en.bdb: The Lord God is Inaccessible and Unfathomable; there is no other equal to Him.
en.ms: Inaccessible and Inapprehensible is the Lord. None else can equal Him.
en.ssk: The Lord God is Inaccessible and Unfathomable; there is no other equal to Him.

es.sn: Dios es Infinito e Imperceptible y no hay nada ni nadie que Lo puede igualar.

en.bdb: The Perfect Guru has taught this Truth. Nanak proclaims it to the world. ||3||1||
en.ms: The perfect Guru has instructed Nanak in Truth and this is what he preaches into the world.
en.ssk: The Perfect Guru has taught this Truth. Nanak proclaims it to the world. ||3||1||

es.sn: El Guru Perfecto ha instruido a Nanak en Su Verdad y éste es Su Mensaje al ser humano. (3-1)
